textTemplates.name: Email_1
textTemplates.text:
Hi {!$Record.Opportunity__r.Contact_Survey__r.FirstName},

I'm happy to hear that you are running the Peer Mentorship Curriculum at {!$Record.Opportunity__r.Account.Account_Name_Formula__c}!

Here is the link to the Circles Resource Page: https://livedifferent.com/circles-resources

All the videos (including training videos), session guides, follow-up resources, and everything you may need is on there!

Important - save this password

Password: LDlicense3304Circles

This password is used to access the videos for each Circles episode, hosted on Vimeo.

In exchange for a pro-bono license for this program, what we ask of you is to share some updates so that we can track the impact the program is making (which is crucial for both funding and program improvement). We will send you the form that you just filled out to update periodically. Additionally, at the end of each run of the Circles program, we send a short survey and ask for stories and photos/videos of your Compassion Project.

Warm Regards,

{!$Record.Owner__r.FirstName} {!$Record.Owner__r.LastName}

textTemplates.name: Email_1_next_run
textTemplates.text:
Hi {!$Record.Opportunity__r.Contact_Survey__r.FirstName},

Thanks for recording another run of the Peer Mentorship Curriculum! It's wonderful to see the program being utilized. If you have any questions or need support, please feel free to email or call me any time at {!$Record.Owner__r.Phone}.

Here is the link again to the Circles Resource Page: https://livedifferent.com/circles-resources and the password: LDlicense3304Circles.

You can use this to access the videos.

In exchange for a pro-bono license for this program, we ask that you share some updates so that we can track the program’s impact (which is crucial for both funding and program improvement). We will send you the form that you just filled out to update periodically. Additionally, at the end of each run of the Circles program, we send a short survey and ask for stories and photos/videos of your Compassion Project.

Warm regards,

{!$Record.Owner__r.FirstName} {!$Record.Owner__r.LastName}

textTemplates.name: email_1b_before_start
textTemplates.text:
Hey {!$Record.Opportunity__r.Contact_Survey__r.FirstName},

Hope you are looking forward to starting your Circles peer mentorship curriculum in a couple days! Just thought I'd check in and see if you have any questions before you start on {!$Record.Start_Date__c}?

If your start dates has changed, would you mind reviewing the information that we have here and updating us when you plan on starting?

Cheers,

{!$Record.Owner__r.FirstName}

P.S. Here is the link and password again incase it's helpful:

Circles Resource Page and videos: https://livedifferent.com/circles-resources

Password for videos: LDlicense3304Circles

textTemplates.name: email_2
textTemplates.text:
Hey {!$Record.Opportunity__r.Contact_Survey__r.FirstName},

I believe you are halfway through the Peer Mentorship Curriculum based on the dates we received from you. I wanted to check in and see if you are on track to end on {!$Record.End_date__c}?

If you had to adjust your dates, no biggie! Would you mind reviewing the information that we have here and updating anything that has changed?

Cheers,

{!$Record.Owner__r.FirstName}

textTemplates.name: Email_2a_Compassion_Project_Doc
textTemplates.text:
Hi {!$Record.Opportunity__r.Contact_Survey__r.FirstName},

I know it may seem early to think about the final project of your Circles run, but the Compassion Project is actually the most important part of the entire Peer Mentorship experience. Think of it as an exit ticket! I would encourage students at the next session to start discussing what they want to do for their project. Here is a doc of Compassion Project examples if your students are stuck and need help to get the ball rolling!

Cheers,

{!$Record.Owner__r.FirstName}

textTemplates.name: email_3
textTemplates.text:
Hi {!$Record.Opportunity__r.Contact_Survey__r.FirstName},

Congratulations on completing the Peer Mentorship Curriculum with your students!

Before I send over the leadership certificates, I am sending two things:

  • Please fill out the main contact post-program report (you'll also be asked to share some photos of your Compassion Project); and
  • send the post-program survey to your students

Thank you!

{!$Record.Owner__r.FirstName}

textTemplates.name: email_4_reminder_1
textTemplates.text:
Hi {!$Record.Opportunity__r.Contact_Survey__r.FirstName},


I am sending a friendly reminder about the report (takes 5 to 10mins) and student survey in my last email, thank you!

Talk soon,

{!$Record.Owner__r.FirstName}

textTemplates.name: email_5_reminder_2
textTemplates.text:
Hi {!$Record.Opportunity__r.Contact_Survey__r.FirstName},

I hope you're doing well! I wanted to follow up again about the post-program report. As per the agreement/contract you filled out, providing these reports is a required part of the program to ensure we can track its impact and effectiveness.

Completing this form is also the final step before the leadership certificates are triggered to send. HERE is the link again for quick access. It only takes about 5 to 10 minutes to complete.

If you have any questions or need assistance, please feel free to reach out!

Cheers,

{!$Record.Owner__r.FirstName}

textTemplates.name: email_with_PMC_list
textTemplates.text:
Hi {!$Record.Opportunity__r.Contact_Survey__r.FirstName},

I just wanted to connect about your next runs of Circles.

Are you planning on delivering Circles again? Here is a list of what we have recorded so far:

{!listofPMCs}
Circle run #: Start Date End Date # of Adults # of Student Leaders # of Participants

If you have more runs of Circles planned that aren't listed yet, please click here: Add New Circles Run to record your next one. Even if you only have a rough details, it will be helpful for us to be aware

Thank you!

{!$Record.Owner__r.FirstName}
